summary: Completed testing of Iteration 11 features: MPBSE Syllabus API, Unified Syllabus API, StudyTino Syllabus Progress, and School Registration Board Selection. Backend: 22/22 tests passed (100%). Frontend: StudyTino Dashboard shows Syllabus Progress with NCERT data, TeachTino Dashboard working, School Registration Form has Board Type dropdown with NCERT/MPBSE options.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/mpbse/summary - Returns 238 chapters, 469 topics, 12 classes, 9 subjects
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/classes - Returns all 12 classes (1-12)
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/subjects/10 - Returns Hindi, English, Mathematics, Science, Social Science
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/syllabus/10?subject=Science - Returns 16 chapters with topics
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/syllabus/9?subject=Mathematics - Returns 15 chapters
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/syllabus/12?subject=Physics - Returns 14 chapters
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/search?query=newton - Returns matching results
Backend: GET /api/mpbse/subjects/99 - Returns 404 for invalid class
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/boards - Returns NCERT and MPBSE boards
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/MPBSE/classes - Returns 12 classes with board_name
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/NCERT/classes - Returns 12 classes with board_name
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/NCERT/syllabus/10?subject=Mathematics - Returns 15 chapters with Quadratic Equations
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/MPBSE/syllabus/10?subject=Science - Returns 16 chapters
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/search/all?query=quadratic - Searches both NCERT and MPBSE, returns 4 results
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/search/all?query=nutrition - Returns results from both boards
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/INVALID/classes - Returns 404 for invalid board
Backend: GET /api/syllabus/mpbse/classes - Board names are case insensitive
Backend: MPBSE Class 9 has all required subjects (Hindi, English, Math, Science, Social Science)
Backend: MPBSE Class 10 has all required subjects
Backend: MPBSE Class 11 has science stream subjects (Physics, Chemistry, Math, Biology)
Backend: MPBSE Class 12 has science stream subjects
Backend: All MPBSE chapters have topics array
Frontend: StudyTino login works with student credentials (STD-2026-285220)
Frontend: StudyTino Dashboard shows Syllabus Progress section with Board: NCERT
Frontend: StudyTino shows Hindi (6/17 chapters, 35%), English (4/11, 36%), Math (6/15, 40%), Science (6/16, 38%)
Frontend: StudyTino shows Upcoming Online Tests section
Frontend: StudyTino shows Online Exams section with Take Online Exam button
Frontend: TeachTino login works with teacher credentials
Frontend: TeachTino Dashboard shows Syllabus Progress for Class 8, 9, 10 Mathematics
Frontend: School Registration Form has Board Type dropdown with NCERT, MPBSE, ICSE, RBSE, UPMSP, CGBSE, IB, Cambridge options
critical_code_review_comments: Unified Syllabus routes in /app/backend/routes/syllabus.py support both NCERT and MPBSE
MPBSE data service in /app/backend/services/mpbse_syllabus.py contains Class 9, 10, 11, 12 with full chapters and topics
Classes 1-8 have placeholder data (book names only, no chapters)
StudyTino Dashboard fetches syllabus based on school's board setting
School Registration Form has data-testid='board-type-select' for testing
Syllabus progress percentages are MOCK values (35-40% completion) - not from real tracking

success_rate.backend: 100% (22/22 MPBSE and Unified Syllabus API tests passed)
success_rate.frontend: 100% (StudyTino Dashboard, TeachTino Dashboard, School Registration Form all working)

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - using existing MPBSE and NCERT static data

mocked_apis_list: MPBSE data is STATIC from official sources (https://mpbse.nic.in) - stored in Python dict, not fetched live
NCERT data is STATIC from official sources (https://ncert.nic.in) - stored in Python dict
Classes 1-8 for MPBSE have placeholder data (book names only)
Syllabus progress percentages are MOCK values (35-40% completion) - not from real student tracking

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 11 features fully tested. New APIs: /api/mpbse/* for MP Board syllabus, /api/syllabus/* for unified multi-board support. MPBSE has 238 chapters and 469 topics for Class 9-12. Unified API supports both NCERT and MPBSE with case-insensitive board names. StudyTino Dashboard shows Syllabus Progress based on school's board (currently NCERT). School Registration Form has Board Type dropdown with 8 options including NCERT and MPBSE. TeachTino Dashboard shows syllabus progress for assigned classes. All previous features (CCTV, Storage, Activity Dashboard, Online Exams) still working.
